message: Or I guess it would be more like {{ topic.name }} hehe
Add a check box to the 'Create new topic' (only on topic pages) that allows you to fork this topic and automatically enter a link to the new topic in the topic it was created in.
It's not hard to copy/paste a link, but I can see it happening a lot in the future.

I think they're trying to make this site as user friendly as they can for everyone, so I'm sure "Forking" wouldn't be the right term. It should probably just say [  ] Let **topic** know of your new topic?
Sounds like a great idea :-) Perhaps calling it "related topic" would be more "friendly", though :-)
phpbb & co have a feature called ghost article or something, which points to the same article that was moved to another subforum, maybe something like a pointer to another topic would be nice
How about an "additional comments" link, when a comment is being forked
